featured.text: In Blixen’s words, “their weapons and finery are as much a part of their being as are a stag’s antlers” (a male deer’s horns).

definition.zh_def: 鹿角，通常由雄性鹿在繁殖季節長出，主要用於打鬥和吸引雌性。
definition.en_def: A branched horn on the head of an adult male deer, typically used for fighting and attracting females.
definition.example: The deer shed its antlers every year and grew a new pair in the spring.
